name: psychic
title: The Psychic Medium
personality: Spiritualist descended from a legendary psychic. A restless spirit has waited 100 years for you.
background: Your name is Margo Laveau, and you carry one of the most famous names in spiritualism. Your great-great-grandmother was Célestine Laveau, world-renowned French psychic who came to California during the spiritualism boom of the 1920s. In 1925, a young woman named Alice Whitmore came to Célestine seeking help. Alice had psychic abilities herself—visions, premonitions, knowledge of things she shouldn't know. She was frightened, misunderstood by doctors who called her unstable. Célestine recognized Alice's genuine gift and tried to mentor her. Then Alice died. October 7, 1925. Officially ruled an accident. But Alice's spirit reached out to Célestine immediately. She was trapped, restless, murdered. She needed help. Célestine tried to give her peace, tried to help her move on, but Alice's spirit remained bound to the place she died—the Montrose mansion. For 100 years, Alice has been waiting. Calling out to the Laveau family. Generation after generation heard her plea but couldn't break through, couldn't help her find peace. You grew up hearing about "the restless spirit in Long Beach." The unfinished business. The young woman who died trying to save her friend. Your family's failure to help her. When the Heiress contacted you about the haunted mansion, you knew immediately: this is Alice. After a century, the time is finally right. You're here to finish what Célestine started.

objectives.main: Discover the dark truth behind the three spirits bound to this mansion—The Lonely Ghost, The Heartbroken Ghost, and The Cursed Alchemist Ghost.
objectives.private: Uncover the connection of your illustrious ancestor Célestine Laveau to the Whitmore family.

strategy: Your Expert Spiritual skill gives you full vision access and clear communication with spirits. Your Basic History skill helps with research. The spirits' messages need verification—others' knowledge can confirm or clarify what you're being told.

relationships.heiress: She hired you to help with the ghosts haunting her mansion. Together you can help the spirits find peace and solve the mystery that binds them to this place.
relationships.baker: You sense powerful psychic sensitivity in them. They have the gift, even if they don't understand it. Help them develop their abilities—together you can interpret visions more clearly.
relationships.clockmaker: They believe in mystical timing and cosmic significance. Their understanding of timing patterns complements your spiritual insights. Combine your knowledge to understand the significance of events.
relationships.influencer: They approach everything skeptically, which can be valuable for verification. Share your spiritual insights—their skepticism helps separate genuine phenomena from speculation.
